医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现英国大多数美容从业者都不是合格的医生伦敦大学学院研究人员对英国美容注射行业的分析显示，注射肉毒杆菌等注射剂的美容从业者中，68%不是合格的医生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230723/Majority-of-cosmetic-practitioners-in-the-UK-are-not-qualified-medical-doctors-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230723/Majority-of-cosmetic-practitioners-in-the-UK-are-not-qualified-medical-doctors-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20caad0c-97f6-4b7a-81a3-887e653df347 Sun, 23 Jul 2023 20:29:34 -0400 Majority of cosmetic practitioners in the UK are not qualified medical doctors, study finds
病毒载量检测不到的艾滋病毒阳性者对性伴侣的风险“几乎为零”根据《柳叶刀》发表的一项分析，艾滋病毒感染者如果病毒水平保持在较低水平但仍可检测到，并坚持抗逆转录病毒疗法，那么将病毒传染给性伴侣的风险几乎为零。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230723/HIV-positive-people-with-unDetectable-viral-load-pose-e28098almost-zeroe28099-risk-to- Sex-partners.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230723/HIV-positive-people-with-unDetectable-viral-load-pose-e28098almost-zeroe28099-risk-to- Sex-partners.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd71bb60-c8fc-4b32-80e4-161d04f0232c Sun, 23 Jul 2023 20:20:55 -0400 HIV-positive people with undetectable viral load pose ‘almost zero’ risk to sexual partners
益生元含量最高的前 5 种食物越来越多的证据表明，食用益生元——；植物中常见的某些类型的纤维可以刺激肠道中的有益细菌；可以帮助维持健康的肠道微生物组。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230723/Top-5-foods-with-the-highest-prebiotic-content.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230723/Top-5-foods-with-the-highest-prebiotic-content.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6678e3c4-3d27-441a-887e-09210a3ede3b Sun, 23 Jul 2023 20:20:00 -0400 Top 5 foods with the highest prebiotic content
遗传学可能在饮食选择中发挥作用在对与饮食相关的基因进行的首批大规模研究之一中，研究人员发现了近 500 个似乎直接影响我们所吃食物的基因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230723/Genetics-may-play-a-role-in-dietary-choices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230723/Genetics-may-play-a-role-in-dietary-choices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=355e7683-64c0-4574-b8f1-4c3458c3cc13 Sun, 23 Jul 2023 20:10:08 -0400 Genetics may play a role in dietary choices
研究发现农村儿童饮食中糖、盐含量较高一项针对宾夕法尼亚州农村地区 10,000 多名儿童的研究显示，很大一部分儿童在出生后的第一年里所吃的食物都是高糖和高盐的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230723/Study-finds-high-rates-of-sugar-salt-in-rural-childrens-diets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230723/Study-finds-high-rates-of-sugar-salt-in-rural-childrens-diets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41f5ece3-45d7-458a-bad8-cae0f34557a9 Sun, 23 Jul 2023 20:09:26 -0400 Study finds high rates of sugar, salt in rural children's diets
研究表明 MIND 饮食可以提高青春期前儿童的注意力一项新的研究表明，最初旨在帮助防止成年人认知能力下降的饮食也可能有助于提高青春期前儿童的注意力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230723/MIND-diet-may-improve-attention-in-pre-adolescents-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230723/MIND-diet-may-improve-attention-in-pre-adolescents-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=282ca92e-816e-49e6-9b39-f9300ab36587 Sun, 23 Jul 2023 20:07:56 -0400 MIND diet may improve attention in pre-adolescents, study shows
研究：对地球友好的饮食可以帮助人们活得更长久、更健康最新研究表明，多吃对地球有益的食物可以帮助你活得更长久、更健康。研究人员发现，在 30 多年的随访期内，与那些不太可持续饮食的人相比，那些遵循更环境可持续饮食的人的死亡可能性降低了 25%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230723/Study-A-planet-friend-diet-could-help-people-to-live-longer-and-healthier.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230723/Study-A-planet-friend-diet-could-help-people-to-live-longer-and-healthier.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=069842c7-fe50-49a7-9ddb-a6a452e009d8 Sun, 23 Jul 2023 20:02:32 -0400 Study: A planet-friendly diet could help people to live longer and healthier
飞往床边的资源为 COVID-19 治疗带来了新希望COVID-19 大流行造成数百万人死亡和持续患病，促使科学家寻求新方法来了解病毒如何巧妙地进入并重新编程人类细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Fly-to-bedside-resource-offers-new-hope-for-COVID-19-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Fly-to-bedside-resource-offers-new-hope-for-COVID-19-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b432d2e6-ea22-4699-a693-978f2df5f76a Fri, 21 Jul 2023 22:17:14 -0400 Fly-to-bedside resource offers new hope for COVID-19 treatments
研究人员发现治疗血吸虫病的新靶点引起血吸虫病（曼氏血吸虫）的蠕虫在很多方面都很不寻常，尤其是雄性和雌性成虫必须终生配对才能成功繁殖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Researchers-uncover-novel-targets-for-treatment-of-schistosomiasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Researchers-uncover-novel-targets-for-treatment-of-schistosomiasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44506682-97ad-4b3a-b18e-3ec54af29b3e Fri, 21 Jul 2023 22:13:25 -0400 Researchers uncover novel targets for treatment of schistosomiasis
肌肉补充剂可能有助于保护记忆力和预防阿尔茨海默病保护记忆力的秘诀可能是健美运动员饮食的主食。 RUSH 研究人员最近发现，一种名为 β-羟基 β-甲基丁酸酯（也称为 HMB）的肌肉增强补充剂可能有助于保护记忆、减少斑块，并最终有助于预防阿尔茨海默病的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Muscle-building-supplement-may-help-protect-memory-and-prevent-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Muscle-building-supplement-may-help-protect-memory-and-prevent-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f3d5452-02ad-477f-b58e-09c1f84ac6bd Fri, 21 Jul 2023 22:08:55 -0400 Muscle-building supplement may help protect memory and prevent Alzheimer's disease
